sect1.title: Regenerating HTTPS Certificates
sect1.para: HTTPS certificates should be regenerated before they expire or to include additional common alternative names. No additional actions are required on the client machines registered to &rmt; server if only HTTPS certificates are regenerated.

step.para: Run the yast rmt module as described in .

sect1.title: Regenerating CA Certificates and HTTPS Certificates
sect1.para: CA certificates can be regenerated after they have expired or in case of security issues.

warning.title: Import CA Certificate on All Clients
warning.para: The newly generated CA certificate must be imported on all clients registered to the RMT server. This can be done by running the rmt-client-setup script on the client machines as described in .

step.para: Remove previously generated CA and HTTPS certificates.
